nodes.text: The Centrality Navy was the armed forces of the Centrality. The fleet operated in the galaxy's Outer Rim.

The navy consisted of thousands of warships and was under direct control of the Centrality Council, but was influenced by Centrality Intelligence and the Central Administrator. Ships of the line were primarily Imperial cruisers and dreadnaughts that were outmoded and considered obsolete by modern Imperial standards. The Wennis, for example, was a decommissioned Imperial cruiser designated for use by Rokur Gepta, the Central Administrator.
In 3 BBY, the Centrality Navy was present at the Battle of ThonBoka.
